titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
The Chair laid before the House a privileged messeage from the Senate.

vote.text: On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to without objection.

reference.label: text as House agreed to Senate amendment

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/22/2007--Passed Senate amended. Provides for a joint session of Congress on January 23, 2007, to receive a message from the President.
